ygData.subject: RE: secret nerfing
ygData.msgSnippet: I think I can pretty much confirm that Mystic Clouding used to make us invisible to undead as well as the living, (AND our fellow group members) but in the
ygData.messageBody:
I think I can pretty much confirm that Mystic Clouding used to make us
invisible to undead as well as the living, (AND our fellow group members)
but in the last 2 days the undead have seen me consistently while singing
it. If anyone else want to test this out or has similar experience with
this, let us know.

It was a typical strategy for me when visiting unrest to go invis right
outside the zone, zone in, restart the song, and start shouting for a group
and wandering around the courtyard and walls. This way I would be left
alone from suprise attacks. Then when a group might answer me with
something like "meet us in the barkeep room" I would just run in and join
them, then stop the song. Many many times I strolled right past trains from
the basement and stood next to hags, etc, without being noticed. Not
anymore :-( Looks like this Bard needs to learn to be a bit more careful
from now on.

Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci
